original_text: Gad's descendants lived in Gilead, in Bashan, and in the small towns near there. They also lived in the whole land of Sharon where there was grass to feed their animals.
korean_text: 그들이 바산길르앗과 그 마을과 사론의 모든 들에 거주하여 그 사방 변두리에 다다랐더라

sentences.original_text: and in the small towns near there
They also lived in the whole land of Sharon
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 사론 온 땅에도 살았는데

sentences.original_text: where there was grass to feed their animals
